channel.title: Pages on Elixir
channel.description: Recent content in Pages on Elixir

item.title: About the Website
item.description: Tech Stack This website was built with the Hugo framework. It is a tool to build static sites. Hugo takes in markdown documents and converts them to HTML. It supports templates, dynamic layouts, site search, and more all with an extremly fast compile time! I used the Blist theme. Some changes were made to the CSS to change the site appearance. The homepage was replaced with custom content. The source code can be found on the Github Repo
